recipesJson.name: Soiree Tropicale
recipesJson.author: Spycke
recipesJson.description:
Tropical sweetness ðŸ’¨
Papaya is the shining star of the night, together with Cantaloupe being a mellowing backing vocal.
Tangerine gives it all a tangy swing, whilst Cactus stands for some extra sweatiness :))
Dragonfruit heats up the crowd with its warm breath 
Last but not least Banana Cream adds enough body to the soul to fill out the gaps :)
Off course sweeten to your taste, for most fruit recipes I use Supersweet around 0.3-0.4 %
